Package com.iontrading.mkv.helper

Class MkvSupplyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.helper.MkvSupplyFactory
  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public class MkvSupplyFactory
extends Object
    This class provides facility factory methods for creating MkvSupply objects which wraps standard Java objects.

      • create

        public static MkvSupply create​(Object[] array)
        Creates a MkvSupply object which wraps the content of the specified array.

        Not null values will be placed in the returned MkvSupply at the same index where they are placed in the provided array.
        Java Classes are converted in ION Bus field types as follows:

        • CharSequence (such as String, StringBuffer, StringBuilder) and MkvValue of type STR int STR fields
        • Double and and MkvValue of type REAL in REAL fields
        • Integer and MkvValue of type INT in INT fields
        Parameters:
        array - the array of values.
        Returns:
        a MkvSupply object representing the content of the specified array.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if an object is not instance of a managed java Class.

      • create

        public static MkvSupply create​(Object[] array,
                               boolean usesDateTimeObjects)
        Creates a MkvSupply object which wraps the content of the specified array.

        Not null values will be placed in the returned MkvSupply at the same index where they are placed in the provided array.
        Java Classes are converted in ION Bus field types as follows:

        • CharSequence (such as String, StringBuffer, StringBuilder) and MkvValue of type STR int STR fields
        • Double and and MkvValue of type REAL in REAL fields
        • Integer and MkvValue of type INT in INT fields
        If usesDateTimeObjecs is set to true, the resulting Supply contains MkvValueDate and MkvValueTime instances corresponding to Date and Time types. If usesDateTimeObjecs is te to false, the resulting Supply contains plain integers corresponding to those fields.
        Parameters:
        array - the array of values.
        usesDateTimeObjects - true if the supply must use MkvData and MkvTime object, rather than raw integers.
        Returns:
        a MkvSupply object representing the content of the specified array.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if an object is not instance of a managed java Class.

      • create

        public static MkvSupply create​(MkvSupply sup)
        Creates a immutable copy of the specified MkvSupply object.
        Parameters:
        sup - the supply to copy.
        Returns:
        a MkvSupply object representing the content of the specified supply.

      • create

        public static MkvSupply create​(MkvSupply sup,
                               boolean usesDateTimeObjects)
        Creates a immutable copy of the specified MkvSupply object. If usesDateTimeObjecs is set to true, the resulting Supply contains MkvValueDate and MkvValueTime instances corresponding to Date and Time types. If usesDateTimeObjecs is te to false, the resulting Supply contains plain integers corresponding to those fields.
        Parameters:
        sup - the supply to copy.
        usesDateTimeObjects - true if the resulting supply shall contain MkvValueDate and MkvValueTime objects instead of raw integers.
        Returns:
        a MkvSupply object representing the content of the specified supply.

      • create

        public static MkvSupplyProxy create​(MkvType type,
                                    Class c,
                                    Map fields)
                             throws MkvException
        Returns a MkvSupplyProxy object which simplifies the conversion between MkvSupply objects representing values for the specified MkvType and instances of the specified Class, providing a field map rule.

        The specified class shall provide getter and setter methods for the involved fields and have public visibility. The below table outlines managed java class, the order of the argument types represents also the priority of use in case of overloading.

        • STR: CharSequence(String, StringBuffer, StringBuilder, ...), the getter/setter shall return/accept types: CharSequence or String
        • REAL: the getter/setter shall return/accept types: double or Double
        • INT: the getter/setter shall return/accept types: int or Integer
        • DATE: the getter/setter shall return/accept type: int, Integer, Calendar, or Date
        • TIME: the getter/setter shall return/accept type: int, Integer, Calendar, or Date

        A setter method may accept an argument type which differs from the one returned by the getter of the same field.
        For not primitive types, null value means "field not set".

        Since this method generates java bytecode at runtime, generated object should be cached for reuse, duplicates can be instantiated via a
        MkvSupplyProxy newobj = (MkvSupplyProxy) object.getClass.newInstance();
        statement.

        Parameters:
        type - the MkvType to handle.
        c - the Java Class to handle.
        fields - a Map which keys are MkvType fields and which values are the associated Class fields.
        Returns:
        a MkvSupplyProxy object which simplify the conversion between MkvSupply objects representing values for the specified MkvType and instances of the specified Class, providing a field map rule.
        Throws:
        MkvException - if invalid parameters are provided or if the specified Class has a unsupported structure.

      • create

        public static MkvSupplyProxy create​(MkvType type,
                                    Class c,
                                    String[] fields)
                             throws MkvException
        Returns a MkvSupplyProxy object which simplifies the conversion between MkvSupply objects representing values for the specified MkvType and instances of the specified Class, specifying what fields to handle.

        Only the specified fields with the same name both in MkvType and Class are handled.

        Parameters:
        type - the MkvType to handle.
        c - the Java Class to handle.
        fields - the fields to handle.
        Returns:
        a MkvSupplyProxy object which simplify the conversion between MkvSupply objects representing values for the specified MkvType and instances of the specified Class, specifying what fields to handle.
        Throws:
        MkvException - if invalid parameters are provided or if the specified Class has a unsupported structure.
        See Also:
        create(MkvType, Class, Map)

      • create

        public static MkvSupplyProxy create​(MkvType type,
                                    Class c)
                             throws MkvException
        Returns a MkvSupplyProxy object which simplifies the conversion between MkvSupply objects representing values for the specified MkvType and instances of the specified Class.

        Only the fields of the MkvType which have a getter in the Class are handled.

        Parameters:
        type - the MkvType to handle.
        c - the Java Class to handle.
        Returns:
        a MkvSupplyProxy object which simplify the conversion between MkvSupply objects representing values for the specified MkvType and instances of the specified Class.
        Throws:
        MkvException - if invalid parameters are provided or if the specified Class has a unsupported structure.
        See Also:
        create(MkvType, Class, Map)
